shrimp.name: Step
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: val
output.description: value of step function at x

shrimp.rsl_code: #define stype_$(min:type) #if RENDERER == prman $(val) = step( $(min), $(x) ); #else #ifdef stype_float $(val) = step( $(min), $(x) ); #else $(val) = color( step( comp( $(min),0), comp( $(x),0) ), step( comp( $(min),1), comp( $(x),1) ), step( comp( $(min),2), comp( $(x),2) ) ); #endif /* stype_$(min:type) */ #endif /* RENDERER */ #undef stype_$(min:type)
shrimp.usage: Returns 0 if "x" is less than "min", otherwise returns 1. On color types, it operates on a component basis.
